abstract: Six Republicans on the Senate Commerce Committee are calling on its chairman to investigate the recently leaked e-mail messages from climate scientists for evidence of data manipulation.
snippet: Six Republicans on the Senate Commerce Committee are calling on its chairman to investigate the recently leaked e-mail messages from climate scientists for evidence of data manipulation.
lead_paragraph: Six Republicans who sit on the Senate Commerce Committee are calling on its chairman, John D. Rockefeller IV, Democrat of West Virginia, to investigate the trove of recently leaked e-mail messages from climate scientists for evidence of data manipulation.
